text.div:
Australian Indigenous Status

https://healthterminologies.gov.au/fhir/CodeSystem/australian-indigenous-status-1

The Australian Indigenous Status code system defines concepts to support the representation of a person's indigenous status. That is, whether a person identifies as being of Aboriginal or Torres Strait Islander origin, as represented by a code. The concepts defined in this code system are equivalent to those defined in the value domain for the METEOR data element Person—Indigenous status, code N (https://meteor.aihw.gov.au/content/602543)
